headline.main: The Texts of the Roosevelt and Hull Letters to the House

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Nov. 13 -- Following is the text of President Roosevelt's letter to Speaker Rayburn and Representative McCormack, majority leader, which was read in the House today:
